DOC.brief_title: A Single Dose Study Of Antimineralocorticoid Activity Of PF-03882845 In Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Male and/or female healthy volunteer , age 18 55 year . Females must nonchildbearing potential . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 kg/m2 ; total body weight > 50 kg ( 110 lb ) . Subjects willing able comply schedule visit , treatment plan , laboratory test , diet restriction trial procedure . Subjects supine BP > 140 mm Hg systolic > 90 mm Hg diastolic < 100 mm Hg systolic < 60 mm Hg diastolic base average triplicate Serum potassium > =5.1 mmol/L < 3.5 mmol/L screening , confirm single repeat deem necessary . Estimated GFR < 60 mL/min/1.73 m2 use CockcroftGault formula measurement individual parameter follow least 5 minute rest Screening .
